message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $100. Would you be able to lower the price?
I understand you're looking to keep your spending within $100, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110. Is that something you'd be interested in?
